AND TRIM(UPPER(QPAR.BATCH_NO)) LIKE ('%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{batchNo})) || '%')
AND QPAR.ISP_REQ_DT BETWEEN #{searchIspReqDt[0]} AND #{searchIspReqDt[1]}
